text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1070. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the MSI GS Series GS65 8RF-074CA Stealth Thin 15.6" Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-Bit Gaming Laptop!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Valorant and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the MSI GS Series GS65 8RF-074CA Stealth Thin 15.6" Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-Bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the trackpad is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for gaming. The NVIDIA GTX 1070 in the MSI GS Series GS65 8RF-074CA Stealth Thin 15.6" Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-Bit Gaming Laptop is a powerhouse. Battery life is decent for a gaming laptop too. Very satisfied with this purchase.

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Starfield and Fortnite. The build quality of the MSI GS Series GS65 8RF-074CA Stealth Thin 15.6" Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-Bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Elden Ring and Call of Duty: Warzone. The build quality of the MSI GS Series GS65 8RF-074CA Stealth Thin 15.6" Intel Core i7 8th Gen 8750H (2.20 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 16 GB Memory 256 GB NVMe SSD Windows 10 Pro 64-Bit Gaming Laptop is solid, and the port selection is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!
